reviewText: In his last film Orson Welles returns to the reflections about the power and its consequences. The story takes place in Macau at the end of the 19th century. An old and hated merchant decides to return to reality a legend to show his omnipotence. In this way, he hires a sailor to spend an evening with the aged daughter of a partner who ruined in the past. But the destination will have prepared a surprise... A little masterpice of the director of Citizen Kane. Based in a short story written by Isak Dinesen. Great edition of Zima (from Mexico)
